casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Errol Duke MOSES. No. 574A97-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Kenneth Rose, Durham, for Errol Duke Moses. Steven Arbogast, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for North Carolina Academy of Trial.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Forsyth County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of November 2006."
